oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Steve Dean and Bill Whyte - 2017-05-06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Steve Dean and Bill Whyte from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 6, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Steve Dean; Bill Whyte;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in Music / (02:08)Opening comments by Abigail St. Pierre and introduction of Steve and Bill / (06:04) Opening comments from songwriters / (08:11) Round About Way (Steve Dean) / (11:40) Excerpted Comedy Song (Bill Whyte) / (13:37) Unidentified Song likely titled A Face For Radio (Bill Whyte) / (21:06) Southern Star (Steve Dean with harmony by Bill Whyte) / (26:52) Safe Haven (Bill Whyte) / () (Steve Dean) / (32:11) Answers question from audience about advice for budding songwriters / (33:54) Answers question about the strangest things that has happened to them as songwriters / (36:00) Answers question about the first funny songs written / 37:47) Answers question about the influences on country songwriters / (40:17) Watching You (Steve Dean) / (45:11) Goin' Ugly Early (Bill Whyte) / (48:36) Closing Comments / (53:59) Recording Ends/ (56:49) FILE END.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dean, Steve; Whyte, Bill; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
